description: The European Central Bank has given the Cyprus just a few days to come up with a new bailout deal after the Cypriot parliament rejected a controversial tax on bank deposits as part of its original bailout plan. The government of Mexico is trying to reshape the country's phone and television industries by increasing competition and foreign investment. And, is there any sector -- retail, shipping, tech, intelligence -- that Amazon isn't involved in?
